SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_RADCOA_Session_Detail
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id, session_id, attr_name, attr_value, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_radcoa_session_log_details WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_RADIUS_Session
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id, user_name, service_name, auth_method, auth_source, nas_ip, nas_port, end_host_id, request_status, error_code, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_radius_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Dashboard_Summary
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id, source as req_source ,user_name,service_name,alerts_present,nas_ip,nas_port,conn_status,login_status,error_code,host_mac as mac_address, to_char(Timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as Timestamp, to_char(write_timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as write_timestamp FROM tips_dashboard_summary WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_SNMP_Session_Log
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id, host_mac as mac_address, nad_ip as nas_ip, port_index, port_name, enf_profiles, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_snmp_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_RADCOA_Session_Log
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT session_id, mac_address, user_name, nas_ip, nas_port, request_id, action_id, action_type, action_name, action_display_name, application_name, status_code, status_msg, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_radcoa_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_TACACS_Session
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT server_id , user_session_id, session_id , request_type , user_name , nas_ip , port, remote_address, priv_level, authen_action, authen_type, authen_method, authen_service, service_name, auth_source, tips_roles, tacacs_profiles, request_status, error_code, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_tacacs_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Session_Detail
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id, session_id,type, attr_name,attr_value, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_session_log_details WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Policy_Server_Session
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id,monitor_mode,auth_type,roles,audit_apt,spt,enf_profiles,to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_policy_server_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_RADIUS_Accounting
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT seq_num, id as session_id, user_name, nas_ip_address as nas_ip, nas_port, nas_port_type, calling_station_id, called_station_id, framed_ip_address as ip_address, service_type, acct_status_type, acct_delay_time, acct_input_octets, acct_output_octets, acct_input_packets, acct_output_packets, acct_session_id, acct_authentic, acct_session_time, acct_terminate_cause, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_radius_accounting_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_DHCP_Snooping_Info
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT mac_address, ip_address, location, hostname, timestamp FROM tips_dhcp_snooping_info WHERE (('1970-01-01 00:00:00 GMT'::timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND ('1970-01-01 00:00:00 GMT'::timestamp<= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Endpoint_Profile
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT mac as mac_address, ip as ip_address, static_ip, hostname, username, nad_ip as nas_ip, device_category, device_family, device_name, to_char(updated_at at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as updated_at, to_char(added_at at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as added_at FROM tips_endpoint_profiles WHERE ((updated_at >= --START-TIME--) AND (updated_at <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Post_Auth_Monit_Config
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id, mac_address, user_id, entity_name, monit_data, enforce_status, profile_id, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_post_auth_monit_config WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Alert
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT session_id, service_name, alert, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_alerts WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_Proc_Stats
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id , process_id, cpu_usage, res_mem_usage, virt_mem_usage, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_sysmon_proc_stats WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_RADIUS_Accounting_Detail
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id, session_id, acct_session_id, type, attr_name, attr_value, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_radius_accounting_details_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_System_Event
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT source as event_source, level, category, description, action_key, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_system_events WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_System_Stat
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id, swap_size_used, slash_size_used, swap_memory_avail, system_memory_avail, cpu_raw_user, cpu_raw_nice, cpu_raw_system, cpu_raw_idle, mgmt_inf_status, data_inf_status, uptime, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_sysmon_system_stats WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_TACACS_Accounting_Detail
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id,session_id,attr_name,attr_value, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_tacacs_accounting_details WHERE((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_TACACS_Accouting_Record
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id, session_id, flags, user_name, nas_ip, port, remote_address, priv_level, authen_type, authen_method, authen_service, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_tacacs_accounting_records WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));

SyslogExportData.name: CPPM_to_ELK_WEBAUTH_Session
SyslogExportData.customSql: SELECT id as session_id, host_mac as mac_address, host_ip as ip_address, auth_source, to_char(timestamp at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS.MS"Z"') as timestamp FROM tips_webauth_session_log WHERE ((timestamp >= --START-TIME--) AND (timestamp <= --END-TIME--));
